title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 467.7 - Records for each plant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 467.7 - Records for each plant

State Regulations
(a) General
instruction, section
461.12
calls for separate records
for the book cost of each plant and the cost of operation of each
plant. (b) Steam obtained from
another company shall be separately accounted for. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
467.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
